EmailTemplate.name: Contract Expired Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!Contract.RecordType} {!Contract.ContractNumber} is expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contract.OwnerFullName},
Your {!Contract.RecordType} {!Contract.ContractNumber} for {!Contract.Account} is Expired as the Contract End date has reached.
Please note you cannot reset an expired Contract to "Draft" status. You can always "Clone" the expired Contract to copy the related information from this expired Contract to create a new Draft version .
Thank you, Hive
